briefTitle: Subcutaneous Ketamine for Postoperative Pain Relief in Rwanda
officialTitle: Subcutaneous Ketamine for Postoperative Pain Relief in Rwanda: a Randomized Control Trial
summary: A randomized double blind control trial to investigate the safety and efficacy of subcutaneous ketamine for control of post operative pain in low resource settings.

primaryOutcome.measure: Postoperative Pain as Measured on a 11-point Numerical Rating Scale
primaryOutcome.timeFrame: The average of twice daily pain scores, from end of surgery until 60 hours postoperative.
